abstract: Reflections on parental loss and the isolation that can come with having a special-needs child.
snippet: Reflections on parental loss and the isolation that can come with having a special-needs child.
lead_paragraph: Terrible pain too often accompanies mother love (and father love, for that matter). I could not let Megan Liberman's post from Monday on Emily Rapp's "Notes From a Dragon Mom" inch down the screen without flagging another - admittedly far less hopeless - reflection on maternal loss that I read some days ago in The Chronicle of Higher Education.
